languages.text: "Это храм закона, воздвигнутый вашими предками. Некоторые дела могли рассудить лишь главы династии, но поскольку иные важные обязанности занимали их время, было построено место для хранения особо сложных случаев. С некоторых пор Дворец Правосудия было дозволено использовать слугам Администратума для рассмотрения тяжб, а во времена Леди Теодоры и Арбитес стали частью судебного процесса".

"It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."
languages.original_text: "Это храм закона, воздвигнутый вашими предками. Некоторые дела могли рассудить лишь главы династии, но поскольку иные важные обязанности занимали их время, было построено место для хранения особо сложных случаев. С некоторых пор Дворец Правосудия было дозволено использовать слугам Администратума для рассмотрения тяжб, а во времена Леди Теодоры и Арбитес стали частью судебного процесса".

At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing lawsuits; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

languages.text: "Er ist ein Tempel des Gesetzes, errichtet von unseren Ahnen. Manche Fälle konnten nur von den Köpfen der Dynastie entschieden werden, aber da ihre Zeit von anderen wichtigen Pflichten beansprucht wurde, baute man eine Art Aufbewahrungsstätte für besonders komplexe Fälle. Zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt durften Diener des Administratums den Justizpalast benutzen, um Dispute zu schlichten. Später, zu Zeiten Lady Theodoras, wurden auch die Arbites zu einem Bestandteil der Gerichtsverfahren."
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

traits.locale_text: "Er ist ein Tempel des Gesetzes, errichtet von unseren Ahnen. Manche Fälle konnten nur von den Köpfen der Dynastie entschieden werden, aber da ihre Zeit von anderen wichtigen Pflichten beansprucht wurde, baute man eine Art Aufbewahrungsstätte für besonders komplexe Fälle. Zu einem bestimmten Zeitpunkt durften Diener des Administratums den Justizpalast benutzen, um Dispute zu schlichten. Später, zu Zeiten Lady Theodoras, wurden auch die Arbites zu einem Bestandteil der Gerichtsverfahren."

languages.text: « C'est un temple de la loi érigé par vos ancêtres. Certaines affaires ne pouvaient être jugées que par les chefs de la dynastie, mais puisqu'ils avaient déjà fort à faire par ailleurs, le palais de justice a été bâti spécialement pour les dossiers les plus complexes en attente de traitement. À un moment donné, les serviteurs de l'Administratum ont été autorisés à s'en servir pour régler les litiges en tout genre. Puis, du temps de dame Théodora, l'Arbites a été intégré à son tour dans les procédures légales. »
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

traits.locale_text: « C'est un temple de la loi érigé par vos ancêtres. Certaines affaires ne pouvaient être jugées que par les chefs de la dynastie, mais puisqu'ils avaient déjà fort à faire par ailleurs, le palais de justice a été bâti spécialement pour les dossiers les plus complexes en attente de traitement. À un moment donné, les serviteurs de l'Administratum ont été autorisés à s'en servir pour régler les litiges en tout genre. Puis, du temps de dame Théodora, l'Arbites a été intégré à son tour dans les procédures légales. »

languages.text: “正义大殿是律法的圣殿，由您的先祖建立。部分案件必须由整个王朝的最高领袖进行处理，但由于王朝领袖时间宝贵，需要行使至关重要的职责，因此历代行商浪人建造了这座大殿，用来储存那些特别复杂的案子。在一定程度上，内政部也有权使用正义大殿审理法律纠纷，而到了西奥多拉夫人的时代，法务部也需要在诉讼过程中履行职责。”
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

traits.locale_text: “正义大殿是律法的圣殿，由您的先祖建立。部分案件必须由整个王朝的最高领袖进行处理，但由于王朝领袖时间宝贵，需要行使至关重要的职责，因此历代行商浪人建造了这座大殿，用来储存那些特别复杂的案子。在一定程度上，内政部也有权使用正义大殿审理法律纠纷，而到了西奥多拉夫人的时代，法务部也需要在诉讼过程中履行职责。”
“正义大殿是律法的圣殿，由您的先祖建立。部分案件必须由整个王朝的最高领袖进行处理，但由于王朝领袖时间宝贵，需要行使至关重要的职责，因此历代行商浪人建造了这座大殿，用来储存那些特别复杂的案子。在一定程度上，内政部也有权使用正义大殿审理法律诉讼，而到了西奥多拉夫人的时代，法务部也需要在诉讼过程中履行职责。”

languages.text: «Es un templo de la ley que erigieron sus ancestros. Solo los líderes de la dinastía podían resolver algunos casos, pero, como su tiempo estaba limitado por otros deberes importantes, se construyeron unas instalaciones para almacenar casos especialmente complejos. En cierto momento, los sirvientes del Administratum recibieron permiso para usar el Palacio de la Justicia en la resolución de disputas y, finalmente, en tiempos de lady Theodora, el Arbites también se sumó a los procedimientos legales».
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

traits.locale_text: «Es un templo de la ley que erigieron sus ancestros. Solo los líderes de la dinastía podían resolver algunos casos, pero, como su tiempo estaba limitado por otros deberes importantes, se construyeron unas instalaciones para almacenar casos especialmente complejos. En cierto momento, los sirvientes del Administratum recibieron permiso para usar el Palacio de la Justicia en la resolución de disputas y, finalmente, en tiempos de lady Theodora, el Arbites también se sumó a los procedimientos legales».

languages.text: 「それはあなた方の先祖によって建てられた法の神殿です。いくつかの案件は王朝の長によってしか解決できませんでしたが、彼らの時間が他の重要な職務に取られていたため、特に複雑な案件を保管する施設が建てられました。ある時点で、帝国行政局の職員が紛争の審理のためにこの司法宮を使用することが許され、レディ・シオドーラの時代には、高等裁定局も法的手続きの一部となりました」
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

traits.locale_text: 「それはあなた方の先祖によって建てられた法の神殿です。いくつかの案件は王朝の長によってしか解決できませんでしたが、彼らの時間が他の重要な職務に取られていたため、特に複雑な案件を保管する施設が建てられました。ある時点で、帝国行政局の職員が紛争の審理のためにこの司法宮を使用することが許され、レディ・シオドーラの時代には、高等裁定局も法的手続きの一部となりました」

languages.text: "Bu, atalarınız tarafından inşa edilmiş bir hukuk tapınağıdır. Kimi davalar yalnızca hanedanların başındaki kişiler tarafından görülürdü ancak bu kişiler diğer önemli işlerle meşgul olduklarından karmaşık meselelerin görülmesi için bir tesis inşa edildi. Daha sonralarda Administratum'un hizmetkârlarının da aralarındaki anlaşmazlıkları çözmeleri için Adalet Sarayı'nı kullanmalarına izin verildi. Leydi Theodora dönemindeyse Arbites de bu yasal prosedürün bir parçası hâline geldi."
languages.original_text: "It is a temple of the law erected by your ancestors. Some cases could only be settled by heads of the dynasty, but since their time was occupied by other important duties, a facility was built for storing especially complex cases. At a certain point, servants of the Administratum were permitted to use the Palace of Justice for hearing disputes; then, in Lady Theodora's time, the Arbites became part of the legal procedure as well."

Kimi davalar yalnızca hanedanların başındaki kişiler tarafından görülürdü ancak bu kişiler diğer önemli işlerle meşgul olduklarından, karmaşık meselelerin görülmesi için bir tesis inşa edildi. Daha sonralarda Administratum'un hizmetkârlarının da aralarındaki anlaşmazlıkları çözmeleri için Adalet Sarayı'nı kullanmalarına izin verildi. Leydi Theodora dönemindeyse Arbites de bu yasal prosedürün bir parçası hâline geldi."
